name: Driving LENOXX
description:
LENOXX, a sentient autonomous vehicle, is in a predicament. An unknown illness has struck the car, temporarily disabling some of its self-driving capabilities. It is now up to you to help LENOXX help you reach your destination safely.

Make sure to press the right Button/Key on specific points of interest to progress through the game (No Button Spamming Sorry). 

LENOXX will give out hints on what button you should press and when. Failure to do so will result with LENOXX lecturing you! 

Controls:

Move mouse to look around 

A - Indicate Left

D - Indicate Right

S - Maintain Speed

SPACE - Fully Stop

F - Turn on Headlights

P - Check Phone Notification

Visual Assets:

3d Assets from Synty Polygon Pack - City, Farm, and Prototype

Orbitron Font from Google Fonts

Cursor from Clean Vector Icons by PONETI in the Unity Asset Store

Audio Assets:

Samples/Loops from Soundtrack Loops - Brazilian Lounge, Cosmic Sea, Depth Charge DnB, Synth Fuel 2 Drones & FX

Car SFX from Vehicle - Essentials by Nox_Sound in the Unity Asset Store

Phone Notification sound from Mixkit
